main.java

Class GameVariables

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.GameVariables

  • public class GameVariables
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains references to objects needed for the game. Makes use of a static initializer to call the registerObjects method before any others.
    Version:
    1.0, May 2020.
    Author:
    Daniel Felgate, He Zheng Jing Rui
    See Also:
    registerObjects()

      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      The number of actions remaining for the player to use.

      Hash Map that maps from a CropType to a Crop object.
      static int currentDay
      The day the game is currently on.

      Reference to the game's farmer.

      A static Random function for all classes to use.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void registerObjects()
      Registers all Crops, Animals, and Items by adding them to the HashMap registries and creates a new Store instance.
      static int score()
      Calculates the final score based on the farm's money and animals.
